text: Masavema frenteno azeri ruotage'ma hu'nea ne' Sairusinkura Ra Anumzamo'a amanage hu'ne, Nagra tamaga kaziga azante azerine'na hankavea nemisanugeno, ina kuma'mo ha'ma eme huntesniana hara hugate'nereno, kini vahera hara huzmagatereno hankavezamia eri atregahie. Nagra ranra kumatmimofo kafana anagi'na eri hagro hunentesugeno mago vahe'mo'a ana kafana eri onkigahie.
